citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 on
05/18/2015. Contact was made with an employee that was not authorized to conduct inspections. Owner was
contacted and would not be available for inspection on this date.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 on
05/18/2015.  Contact was made with an employee that was not authorized to conduct inspections.  Owner was
contacted and would not be available for inspection on this date.
